long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse our website for quick access to NMFC codes. We offer a comprehensive NMFC code list and NMFC number lookup tools. 
Whether you're a logistics professional in the shipping industry or just need to find the NMFC code for a specific commodity, our site is here to help. 
Our goal is to simplify and streamline your shipping and freight classification tasks. Visit our web page now for comprehensive, accurate NMFC code lookup tools.

Changelog:
v1.5: Add CEVA Location search & update check.
v1.4: the search for FedEx information has been added
v1.3: In this version update, the search for FBA information has been added, and the UI design has been restructured using dropdown menus, making the page more streamlined.
